TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit EventLogPermissionEntry extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Defines the smallest unit of a code access security permission that is set for an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information on code access security, see [Code Access Security](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess permissionAccess, string machineName) cil managed

Docs.param: A bitwise combination of the values. The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionEntry.PermissionAccess%2A> property is set to this value.
The name of the computer on which to read or write events. The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionEntry.MachineName%2A> property is set to this value.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the application is running in a High trust zone, request for permission to the local machine must refer to the machine name as COMPUTERNAME or ".", instead of the full machine name. Full machine name is not accepted for security reasons. In addition, the COMPUTERNAME must be treated as case-sensitive.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the computer on which to read or write events.
Docs.value: The name of the computer on which to read or write events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the application is running in a High trust zone, request for permission to the local machine must refer to the machine name as COMPUTERNAME or ".", instead of the full machine name. Full machine name is not accepted for security reasons. In addition, the COMPUTERNAME must be treated as case-sensitive.

Docs.summary: Gets the permission access levels used in the permissions request.
Docs.value: A bitwise combination of the values.
